mapper.sql: T.ID AS "id", T.CREATE_DATE AS "createDate", T.CREATE_USER AS "createUser", T.UPDATE_DATE AS "updateDate", T.UPDATE_USER AS "updateUser", T.REMARKS AS "remarks", T.DEL_FLAG AS "delFlag", T.DESCRIBE AS "describe", T.TYPE AS "type", T.SET_OPTION AS "setOption", T.Z_SOURCE AS "zsource", T.Z_KEY AS "zkey", T.Z_VALUE AS "zvalue", T.X_SOURCE AS "xsource", T.X_KEY AS "xkey", T.X_Z_KEY AS "xzkey", T.X_VALUE AS "xvalue", T.Y_SOURCE AS "ysource", T.Y_Z_KEY AS "yzkey", T.Y_X_KEY AS "yxkey", T.Y_VALUE AS "yvalue", T.FUNC AS "func"

sql.where:
1=1
AND T.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate}
AND T.CREATE_USER LIKE '%'||#{createUser}||'%'
AND T.UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}
AND T.UPDATE_USER LIKE '%'||#{updateUser}||'%'
AND T.REMARKS LIKE '%'||#{remarks}||'%'
AND T.DEL_FLAG LIKE '%'||#{delFlag}||'%'
AND T.DESCRIBE LIKE '%'||#{describe}||'%'
AND T.TYPE LIKE '%'||#{type}||'%'
AND T.Z_SOURCE LIKE '%'||#{zsource}||'%'
AND T.Z_KEY LIKE '%'||#{zkey}||'%'
AND T.Z_VALUE LIKE '%'||#{zvalue}||'%'
AND T.X_SOURCE LIKE '%'||#{xsource}||'%'
AND T.X_KEY LIKE '%'||#{xkey}||'%'
AND T.X_Z_KEY LIKE '%'||#{xzkey}||'%'
AND T.X_VALUE LIKE '%'||#{xvalue}||'%'
AND T.Y_SOURCE LIKE '%'||#{ysource}||'%'
AND T.Y_Z_KEY LIKE '%'||#{yzkey}||'%'
AND T.Y_X_KEY LIKE '%'||#{yxkey}||'%'
AND T.Y_VALUE LIKE '%'||#{yvalue}||'%'

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) total FROM KS_CHART_ENGINE T

SELECT COUNT(1) total FROM KS_CHART_ENGINE T
AND T.ID != #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO KS_CHART_ENGINE (
REMARKS, DEL_FLAG, DESCRIBE, TYPE, SET_OPTION, Z_SOURCE, Z_KEY, Z_VALUE, X_SOURCE, X_KEY, X_Z_KEY, X_VALUE, Y_SOURCE, Y_Z_KEY, Y_X_KEY, Y_VALUE, FUNC, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, ID ) VALUES (
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{setOption,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{zsource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xsource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xzkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ysource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yzkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yxkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{func,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{createUser.userName}, sysdate, #{id} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE KS_CHART_ENGINE
REMARKS=#{remarks},
DEL_FLAG=#{delFlag},
DESCRIBE=#{describe},
TYPE=#{type},
SET_OPTION=#{setOption},
Z_SOURCE=#{zsource},
Z_KEY=#{zkey},
Z_VALUE=#{zvalue},
X_SOURCE=#{xsource},
X_KEY=#{xkey},
X_Z_KEY=#{xzkey},
X_VALUE=#{xvalue},
Y_SOURCE=#{ysource},
Y_Z_KEY=#{yzkey},
Y_X_KEY=#{yxkey},
Y_VALUE=#{yvalue},
FUNC=#{func},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser.userName}, UPDATE_DATE = sysdate, ID = #{id}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM KS_CHART_ENGINE WHERE id IN
#{listId}
